@usedefaults

{{timestamp}}

@block
@row

@col 6
h2. AtYourService Repositories:
{{aysrepos}}
{% for repo in repos -%}
h3. [${repo}|/cockpit/repo?repo=${repo}]:
    * [Templates|cockpit/Templates?ayspath=${repo}]
    * [Instances|cockpit/Instances?ayspath=${repo}]
    * [Blueprints|cockpit/Blueprints?ayspath=${repo}]
    * [Explorer|cockpit/Repo/Explorer?repo=${repo}]
    * [Simulator|cockpit/Repo/simulate?repo=${repo}]
    * [Runs|cockpit/Runs?repo=$$repo]
{% endfor %}
@colend

@col 6
h3. Actions on repositories
{{actions:
- display: Create AYS repository
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/createRepo
  input:
    - name: name
      label: Name
      type: text
      default: ''
- display: Commit repositories
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/commit
  showresponse: True
  input:
    - name: branch
      label: Branch
      type: text
      default: 'master'
    - name: push
      label: push
      type: dropdown
      values:
         - label: True
           value: True
         - label: False
           value: False
    - name: message
      label: Commit message
      type: text
}}
@colend
